abstract: murder investigation launched after man plunges to death from high-rise flats .
article: a man was arrested on suspicion of murdera man fell to his death from a high-rise block of flats on boxing day - sparking a murder inquiry . merseyside police today confirmed detectives from the force arrested a man on suspicion of murder after the body of a man in his 30s was found at the foot of the mosscraig flats in stockbridge village during the early hours of december 26 . people in the flats on mosscraig heard shouting in the building at 1.30 am . officers attending the call found a body outside the flats - which they believe had fallen from an upper-storey balcony .

four britons feared dead in australia seaplane crash horrorthe man 's next of kin have been informed . a 48-year-old man from stockbridge village was arrested on suspicion of murder and has been released on bail . detectives say they 're `` keeping an open mind '' as to how the deceased came to suffer his injuries and a full investigation is being carried out . * anyone with information is asked to call the police on 101 quoting incident reference 0517329643 or leave information anonymously with crimestoppers on 0800 555 111 .
